Documentation
CFEM_DG_EulerSolver.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 /*!
2  * \file CFEM_DG_EulerSolver.cpp
3  * \brief Main subroutines for solving finite element Euler flow problems
4  * \author J. Alonso, E. van der Weide, T. Economon
5  * \version 7.5.0 "Blackbird"
6  *
7  * SU2 Project Website: https://su2code.github.io
8  *
9  * The SU2 Project is maintained by the SU2 Foundation
10  * (http://su2foundation.org)
11  *
12  * Copyright 2012-2022, SU2 Contributors (cf. AUTHORS.md)
13  *
14  * SU2 is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
15  * modify it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public
16  * License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either
17  * version 2.1 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
18  *
19  * SU2 is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
20  * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
21  * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU
22  * Lesser General Public License for more details.
23  *
24  * You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public
25  * License along with SU2. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
26  */
27 
28 
29 #include "../../include/solvers/CFEM_DG_EulerSolver.hpp"
30 #include "../../../Common/include/toolboxes/printing_toolbox.hpp"
31 #include "../../include/fluid/CIdealGas.hpp"
32 #include "../../include/fluid/CVanDerWaalsGas.hpp"
33 #include "../../include/fluid/CPengRobinson.hpp"
34 #include "../../include/fluid/CCoolProp.hpp"
35 
36 #define SIZE_ARR_NORM 8
37 
38 CFEM_DG_EulerSolver::CFEM_DG_EulerSolver(void) : CSolver() {
39 
40  /*--- Basic array initialization ---*/
41 
42  FluidModel = nullptr;
43 
44  CD_Inv = nullptr; CL_Inv = nullptr; CSF_Inv = nullptr; CEff_Inv = nullptr;
45  CMx_Inv = nullptr; CMy_Inv = nullptr; CMz_Inv = nullptr;
46  CFx_Inv = nullptr; CFy_Inv = nullptr; CFz_Inv = nullptr;
47 
48  /*--- Surface-based array initialization ---*/
49  Surface_CL_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CD_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CSF_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CEff_Inv = nullptr;
50  Surface_CFx_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CFy_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CFz_Inv = nullptr;
51  Surface_CMx_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CMy_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CMz_Inv = nullptr;
52 
53  Surface_CL = nullptr; Surface_CD = nullptr; Surface_CSF = nullptr; Surface_CEff = nullptr;
54  Surface_CFx = nullptr; Surface_CFy = nullptr; Surface_CFz = nullptr;
55  Surface_CMx = nullptr; Surface_CMy = nullptr; Surface_CMz = nullptr;
56 
57  /*--- Initialization of the boolean symmetrizingTermsPresent. ---*/
58  symmetrizingTermsPresent = true;
59 
60  /*--- Initialize the variables for the monitoring data to avoid
61  possible valgrind warnings. ---*/
62  Total_CL = Total_CD = Total_CSF = 0.0;
63  Total_CFx = Total_CFy = Total_CFz = 0.0;
64  Total_CMx = Total_CMy = Total_CMz = 0.0;
65  Total_CEff = 0.0;
66 
67  /*--- Initialize the pointer for performing the BLAS functionalities. ---*/
68  blasFunctions = nullptr;
69 
70 }
71 
72 CFEM_DG_EulerSolver::CFEM_DG_EulerSolver(CConfig *config, unsigned short val_nDim, unsigned short iMesh) : CSolver() {
73 
74  /*--- Basic array initialization ---*/
75 
76  FluidModel = nullptr;
77 
78  CD_Inv = nullptr; CL_Inv = nullptr; CSF_Inv = nullptr; CEff_Inv = nullptr;
79  CMx_Inv = nullptr; CMy_Inv = nullptr; CMz_Inv = nullptr;
80  CFx_Inv = nullptr; CFy_Inv = nullptr; CFz_Inv = nullptr;
81 
82  /*--- Surface-based array initialization ---*/
83  Surface_CL_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CD_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CSF_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CEff_Inv = nullptr;
84  Surface_CFx_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CFy_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CFz_Inv = nullptr;
85  Surface_CMx_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CMy_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CMz_Inv = nullptr;
86 
87  Surface_CL = nullptr; Surface_CD = nullptr; Surface_CSF = nullptr; Surface_CEff = nullptr;
88  Surface_CFx = nullptr; Surface_CFy = nullptr; Surface_CFz = nullptr;
89  Surface_CMx = nullptr; Surface_CMy = nullptr; Surface_CMz = nullptr;
90 
91  /*--- Store the multigrid level. ---*/
92  MGLevel = iMesh;
93 
94  /*--- Initialization of the boolean symmetrizingTermsPresent. ---*/
95  symmetrizingTermsPresent = true;
96 
97  /*--- Dummy solver constructor that calls the SetNondim. routine in
98  order to load the flow non-dim. information into the config class.
99  This is needed to complete a partitioning for time-accurate local
100  time stepping that depends on the flow state. ---*/
101  nDim = val_nDim;
102  Gamma = config->GetGamma();
103  Gamma_Minus_One = Gamma - 1.0;
104  SetNondimensionalization(config, iMesh, false);
105 
106  /*--- Initialize the variables for the monitoring data to avoid
107  possible valgrind warnings. ---*/
108  Total_CL = Total_CD = Total_CSF = 0.0;
109  Total_CFx = Total_CFy = Total_CFz = 0.0;
110  Total_CMx = Total_CMy = Total_CMz = 0.0;
111  Total_CEff = 0.0;
112 
113  /*--- Initialize the pointer for performing the BLAS functionalities. ---*/
114  blasFunctions = nullptr;
115 
116 }
117 
118 CFEM_DG_EulerSolver::CFEM_DG_EulerSolver(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh) : CSolver() {
119 
120  /*--- Array initialization ---*/
121  FluidModel = nullptr;
122 
123  CD_Inv = nullptr; CL_Inv = nullptr; CSF_Inv = nullptr; CEff_Inv = nullptr;
124  CMx_Inv = nullptr; CMy_Inv = nullptr; CMz_Inv = nullptr;
125  CFx_Inv = nullptr; CFy_Inv = nullptr; CFz_Inv = nullptr;
126 
127  Surface_CL_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CD_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CSF_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CEff_Inv = nullptr;
128  Surface_CFx_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CFy_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CFz_Inv = nullptr;
129  Surface_CMx_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CMy_Inv = nullptr; Surface_CMz_Inv = nullptr;
130 
131  Surface_CL = nullptr; Surface_CD = nullptr; Surface_CSF = nullptr; Surface_CEff = nullptr;
132  Surface_CFx = nullptr; Surface_CFy = nullptr; Surface_CFz = nullptr;
133  Surface_CMx = nullptr; Surface_CMy = nullptr; Surface_CMz = nullptr;
134 
135  /*--- Store the multigrid level. ---*/
136  MGLevel = iMesh;
137 
138  /*--- Allocate the memory for blasFunctions. ---*/
139  blasFunctions = new CBlasStructure;
140 
141  /*--- Set the gamma value ---*/
142  Gamma = config->GetGamma();
143  Gamma_Minus_One = Gamma - 1.0;
144 
145  /*--- Define geometry constants in the solver structure. ---*/
146  nDim = geometry->GetnDim();
147  nMarker = config->GetnMarker_All();
148 
149  const bool compressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == ENUM_REGIME::COMPRESSIBLE);
150 
151  if( compressible ) nVar = nDim + 2;
152  else nVar = nDim + 1;
153 
154  /*--- Create an object of the class CMeshFEM_DG and retrieve the necessary
155  geometrical information for the FEM DG solver. ---*/
156  CMeshFEM_DG *DGGeometry = dynamic_cast<CMeshFEM_DG *>(geometry);
157 
158  nVolElemTot = DGGeometry->GetNVolElemTot();
159  nVolElemOwned = DGGeometry->GetNVolElemOwned();
160  volElem = DGGeometry->GetVolElem();
161 
162  nVolElemOwnedPerTimeLevel = DGGeometry->GetNVolElemOwnedPerTimeLevel();
163  nVolElemInternalPerTimeLevel = DGGeometry->GetNVolElemInternalPerTimeLevel();
164  nVolElemHaloPerTimeLevel = DGGeometry->GetNVolElemHaloPerTimeLevel();
165 
166  ownedElemAdjLowTimeLevel = DGGeometry->GetOwnedElemAdjLowTimeLevel();
167  haloElemAdjLowTimeLevel = DGGeometry->GetHaloElemAdjLowTimeLevel();
168 
169  nMeshPoints = DGGeometry->GetNMeshPoints();
170  meshPoints = DGGeometry->GetMeshPoints();
171 
172  nMatchingInternalFacesWithHaloElem = DGGeometry->GetNMatchingFacesWithHaloElem();
173  nMatchingInternalFacesLocalElem = DGGeometry->GetNMatchingFacesInternal();
174  matchingInternalFaces = DGGeometry->GetMatchingFaces();
175 
176  boundaries = DGGeometry->GetBoundaries();
177 
178  nStandardBoundaryFacesSol = DGGeometry->GetNStandardBoundaryFacesSol();
179  nStandardElementsSol = DGGeometry->GetNStandardElementsSol();
180  nStandardMatchingFacesSol = DGGeometry->GetNStandardMatchingFacesSol();
181 
182  standardBoundaryFacesSol = DGGeometry->GetStandardBoundaryFacesSol();
183  standardElementsSol = DGGeometry->GetStandardElementsSol();
184  standardMatchingFacesSol = DGGeometry->GetStandardMatchingFacesSol();
185 
186  timeCoefADER_DG = DGGeometry->GetTimeCoefADER_DG();
187  timeInterpolDOFToIntegrationADER_DG = DGGeometry->GetTimeInterpolDOFToIntegrationADER_DG();
188  timeInterpolAdjDOFToIntegrationADER_DG = DGGeometry->GetTimeInterpolAdjDOFToIntegrationADER_DG();
189 
190  /*--- Determine the maximum number of integration points used. Usually this
191  is for the volume integral, but to avoid problems the faces are also
192  taken into account. ---*/
193  unsigned short nIntegrationMax = 0;
194  for(unsigned short i=0; i<nStandardBoundaryFacesSol; ++i) {
195  const unsigned short nInt = standardBoundaryFacesSol[i].GetNIntegration();
196  nIntegrationMax = max(nIntegrationMax, nInt);
197  }
198 
199  for(unsigned short i=0; i<nStandardElementsSol; ++i) {
200  const unsigned short nInt = standardElementsSol[i].GetNIntegration();
201  nIntegrationMax = max(nIntegrationMax, nInt);
202  }
203 
204  for(unsigned short i=0; i<nStandardMatchingFacesSol; ++i) {
205  const unsigned short nInt = standardMatchingFacesSol[i].GetNIntegration();
206  nIntegrationMax = max(nIntegrationMax, nInt);
207  }
208 
209  /*--- Determine the maximum number of DOFs used. This is for the volume elements.
210  Note that also the element adjacent to side 1 of the matching faces must
211  be taken into account, because this could be an external element. */
212  unsigned short nDOFsMax = 0;
213  for(unsigned short i=0; i<nStandardElementsSol; ++i) {
214  const unsigned short nDOFs = standardElementsSol[i].GetNDOFs();
215  nDOFsMax = max(nDOFsMax, nDOFs);
216  }
217 
218  for(unsigned short i=0; i<nStandardMatchingFacesSol; ++i) {
219  const unsigned short nDOFs = standardMatchingFacesSol[i].GetNDOFsElemSide1();
220  nDOFsMax = max(nDOFsMax, nDOFs);
221  }
222 
223  /*--- Determine the size of the work array. ---*/
224  const unsigned short nPadGemm = config->GetSizeMatMulPadding();
225  if( config->GetViscous() ) {
226 
227  /* Viscous simulation. */
228  unsigned int sizeFluxes = nIntegrationMax*nDim;
229  sizeFluxes = nPadGemm*max(sizeFluxes, (unsigned int) nDOFsMax);
230 
231  const unsigned int sizeGradSolInt = nIntegrationMax*nDim*max(nPadGemm,nDOFsMax);
232 
233  sizeWorkArray = nIntegrationMax*(4 + 3*nPadGemm) + sizeFluxes + sizeGradSolInt
234  + max(nIntegrationMax,nDOFsMax)*nPadGemm + nPadGemm*nDOFsMax;
235  }
236  else {
237 
238  /* Inviscid simulation. */
239  unsigned int sizeVol = nPadGemm*nIntegrationMax*(nDim+2) + nPadGemm*nDOFsMax;
240  unsigned int sizeSur = nPadGemm*(2*nIntegrationMax + max(nIntegrationMax,nDOFsMax));
241 
242  sizeWorkArray = max(sizeVol, sizeSur);
243  }
244 
245  if(config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_Flow() == ADER_DG) {
246 
247  /*--- ADER-DG scheme. Determine the size needed for the predictor step
248  and make sure that sizeWorkArray is big enough. This size depends
249  whether an aliased or a non-aliased predictor step is used. Note
250  that the size estimates are for viscous computations. ---*/
251  const unsigned short nTimeDOFs = config->GetnTimeDOFsADER_DG();
252 
253  unsigned int sizePredictorADER = 4*nPadGemm*nDOFsMax*nTimeDOFs
254  + nPadGemm*nDOFsMax;
255 
256  if(config->GetKind_ADER_Predictor() == ADER_ALIASED_PREDICTOR)
257  sizePredictorADER += nDim*nPadGemm*nDOFsMax + nDim*nDim*nPadGemm*nIntegrationMax;
258  else
259  sizePredictorADER += (nDim+1)*nPadGemm*max(nIntegrationMax, nDOFsMax)
260  + nDim*nDim*nPadGemm*max(nIntegrationMax,nDOFsMax);
261 
262  sizeWorkArray = max(sizeWorkArray, sizePredictorADER);
263  }
264 
265  /*--- Perform the non-dimensionalization for the flow equations using the
266  specified reference values. ---*/
267  SetNondimensionalization(config, iMesh, true);
268 
269  /*--- Check if we are executing a verification case. If so, the
270  VerificationSolution object will be instantiated for a particular
271  option from the available library of verification solutions. Note
272  that this is done after SetNondim(), as problem-specific initial
273  parameters are needed by the solution constructors. ---*/
274 
275  SetVerificationSolution(nDim, nVar, config);
276 
277  /*--- Define some auxiliary vectors related to the residual ---*/
278 
279  Residual_RMS.resize(nVar,1.e-35);
280  Residual_Max.resize(nVar,1.e-35);
281  Point_Max.resize(nVar,0);
282  Point_Max_Coord.resize(nVar,nDim) = su2double(0.0);
283 
284  /*--- Non-dimensional coefficients ---*/
285  CD_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
286  CL_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
287  CSF_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
288  CMx_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
289  CMy_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
290  CMz_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
291  CEff_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
292  CFx_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
293  CFy_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
294  CFz_Inv = new su2double[nMarker];
295 
296  Surface_CL_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
297  Surface_CD_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
298  Surface_CSF_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
299  Surface_CEff_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
300  Surface_CFx_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
301  Surface_CFy_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
302  Surface_CFz_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
303  Surface_CMx_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
304  Surface_CMy_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
305  Surface_CMz_Inv = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
306  Surface_CL = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
307  Surface_CD = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
308  Surface_CSF = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
309  Surface_CEff = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
310  Surface_CFx = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
311  Surface_CFy = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
312  Surface_CFz = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
313  Surface_CMx = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
314  Surface_CMy = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
315  Surface_CMz = new su2double[config->GetnMarker_Monitoring()];
316 
317  /*--- Init total coefficients ---*/
318  Total_CD = 0.0; Total_CL = 0.0; Total_CSF = 0.0;
319  Total_CMx = 0.0; Total_CMy = 0.0; Total_CMz = 0.0;
320  Total_CFx = 0.0; Total_CFy = 0.0; Total_CFz = 0.0;
321  Total_CEff = 0.0;
322 
323  /*--- Read farfield conditions ---*/
324  Density_Inf = config->GetDensity_FreeStreamND();
325  Pressure_Inf = config->GetPressure_FreeStreamND();
326  Velocity_Inf = config->GetVelocity_FreeStreamND();
327  Energy_Inf = config->GetEnergy_FreeStreamND();
328  Temperature_Inf = config->GetTemperature_FreeStreamND();
329  Mach_Inf = config->GetMach();
330 
331  /*--- Set the conservative variables of the free-stream. ---*/
332  ConsVarFreeStream.resize(nVar);
333  if( compressible ) {
334  ConsVarFreeStream[0] = Density_Inf;
335  for(unsigned short iDim=0; iDim<nDim; ++iDim)
336  ConsVarFreeStream[iDim+1] = Density_Inf*Velocity_Inf[iDim];
337  ConsVarFreeStream[nVar-1] = Density_Inf*Energy_Inf;
338  }
339  else {
340  ConsVarFreeStream[0] = Pressure_Inf;
341  for(unsigned short iDim=0; iDim<nDim; ++iDim)
342  ConsVarFreeStream[iDim+1] = Density_Inf*Velocity_Inf[iDim];
343  }
344 
345  /*--- Determine the total number of DOFs stored on this rank and allocate the memory
346  to store the conservative variables. ---*/
347  nDOFsLocOwned = 0;
348  for(unsigned long i=0; i<nVolElemOwned; ++i) nDOFsLocOwned += volElem[i].nDOFsSol;
349 
350  nDOFsLocTot = nDOFsLocOwned;
351  for(unsigned long i=nVolElemOwned; i<nVolElemTot; ++i) nDOFsLocTot += volElem[i].nDOFsSol;
352 
353  VecSolDOFs.resize(nVar*nDOFsLocOwned);
354 
355  /*--- Allocate the memory for the working vectors for the solution variables
356  for all the time levels used. ---*/
357  const unsigned short nTimeLevels = config->GetnLevels_TimeAccurateLTS();
358  VecWorkSolDOFs.resize(nTimeLevels);
359 
360  vector<unsigned long> nDOFsTimeLevels(nTimeLevels, 0);
361  for(unsigned long i=0; i<nVolElemTot; ++i) {
362  nDOFsTimeLevels[volElem[i].timeLevel] += volElem[i].nDOFsSol;
363  if(volElem[i].offsetDOFsSolPrevTimeLevel != ULONG_MAX)
364  nDOFsTimeLevels[volElem[i].timeLevel-1] += volElem[i].nDOFsSol;
365  }
366 
367  for(unsigned short i=0; i<nTimeLevels; ++i)
368  VecWorkSolDOFs[i].resize(nVar*nDOFsTimeLevels[i]);
369 
370  /*--- Check for the ADER-DG time integration scheme and allocate the memory
371  for the additional vectors. ---*/
372  if(config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_Flow() == ADER_DG) {
373 
374  const unsigned short nTimeDOFs = config->GetnTimeDOFsADER_DG();
375 
376  VecTotResDOFsADER.assign(nVar*nDOFsLocTot, 0.0);
377  VecSolDOFsPredictorADER.resize(nTimeDOFs*nVar*nDOFsLocTot);
378  }
379  else {
380 
381  /*--- Runge Kutta type of time integration schemes. Allocate the memory to
382  possibly store the new solution. ---*/
383  if(config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_Flow() == CLASSICAL_RK4_EXPLICIT)
384  VecSolDOFsNew.resize(nVar*nDOFsLocOwned);
385  }
386 
387  /*--- Determine the global number of DOFs. ---*/
388 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
389  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&nDOFsLocOwned, &nDOFsGlobal, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
390 #else
391  nDOFsGlobal = nDOFsLocOwned;
392 #endif
393 
394  /*--- Store the number of DOFs in the geometry class in case of restart. ---*/
395  geometry->SetnPointDomain(nDOFsLocOwned);
396  geometry->SetGlobal_nPointDomain(nDOFsGlobal);
397 
398  /*--- Allocate the memory to store the time steps, residuals, etc. ---*/
399  VecDeltaTime.resize(nVolElemOwned);
400 
401  if(config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_Flow() == ADER_DG)
402  VecResDOFs.resize(nVar*nDOFsLocOwned);
403  else
404  VecResDOFs.resize(nVar*nDOFsLocTot);
405 
406  nEntriesResFaces.assign(nDOFsLocTot+1, 0);
407  nEntriesResAdjFaces.assign(nDOFsLocTot+1, 0);
408  startLocResFacesMarkers.resize(nMarker);
409 
410  startLocResInternalFacesLocalElem.assign(nTimeLevels+1, 0);
411  startLocResInternalFacesWithHaloElem.assign(nTimeLevels+1, 0);
412 
413  /*--- Determine the size of the vector to store residuals that come from the
414  integral over the faces and determine the number of entries in this
415  vector for the local DOFs. ---*/
416  symmetrizingTermsPresent = false;
417  if(config->GetViscous() && (fabs(config->GetTheta_Interior_Penalty_DGFEM()) > 1.e-8))
418  symmetrizingTermsPresent = true;
419 
420  /*--- First the internal matching faces. ---*/
421  unsigned long sizeVecResFaces = 0;
422  for(unsigned long i=0; i<nMatchingInternalFacesWithHaloElem[nTimeLevels]; ++i) {
423 
424  /* Determine the time level of the face. */
425  const unsigned long elem0 = matchingInternalFaces[i].elemID0;
426  const unsigned long elem1 = matchingInternalFaces[i].elemID1;
427  const unsigned short timeLevel = min(volElem[elem0].timeLevel,
428  volElem[elem1].timeLevel);
429 
430  /* The terms that only contribute to the DOFs located on the face.
431  Check the time level of the element compared to the face. */
432  const unsigned short ind = matchingInternalFaces[i].indStandardElement;
433  const unsigned short nDOFsFace0 = standardMatchingFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsFaceSide0();
434  const unsigned short nDOFsFace1 = standardMatchingFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsFaceSide1();
435 
436  sizeVecResFaces += nDOFsFace0;
437  if(timeLevel == volElem[elem0].timeLevel) {
438  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace0; ++j)
439  ++nEntriesResFaces[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolFaceSide0[j]+1];
440  }
441  else {
442  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace0; ++j)
443  ++nEntriesResAdjFaces[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolFaceSide0[j]+1];
444  }
445 
446  sizeVecResFaces += nDOFsFace1;
447  if(timeLevel == volElem[elem1].timeLevel) {
448  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace1; ++j)
449  ++nEntriesResFaces[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolFaceSide1[j]+1];
450  }
451  else {
452  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace1; ++j)
453  ++nEntriesResAdjFaces[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolFaceSide1[j]+1];
454  }
455 
456  /* The symmetrizing terms, if present, contribute to all
457  the DOFs of the adjacent elements. */
458  if( symmetrizingTermsPresent ) {
459  const unsigned short nDOFsElem0 = standardMatchingFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsElemSide0();
460  const unsigned short nDOFsElem1 = standardMatchingFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsElemSide1();
461 
462  sizeVecResFaces += nDOFsElem0;
463  if(timeLevel == volElem[elem0].timeLevel) {
464  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem0; ++j)
465  ++nEntriesResFaces[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolElementSide0[j]+1];
466  }
467  else {
468  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem0; ++j)
469  ++nEntriesResAdjFaces[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolElementSide0[j]+1];
470  }
471 
472  sizeVecResFaces += nDOFsElem1;
473  if(timeLevel == volElem[elem1].timeLevel) {
474  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem1; ++j)
475  ++nEntriesResFaces[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolElementSide1[j]+1];
476  }
477  else {
478  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem1; ++j)
479  ++nEntriesResAdjFaces[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolElementSide1[j]+1];
480  }
481  }
482 
483  /* Store the position of the residual in the appropriate entry. */
484  if(i < nMatchingInternalFacesWithHaloElem[0] )
485  startLocResInternalFacesLocalElem[timeLevel+1] = sizeVecResFaces;
486  else
487  startLocResInternalFacesWithHaloElem[timeLevel+1] = sizeVecResFaces;
488  }
489 
490  /* Set the uninitialized values of startLocResInternalFacesLocalElem. */
491  for(unsigned short i=1; i<=nTimeLevels; ++i) {
492  if(startLocResInternalFacesLocalElem[i] == 0)
493  startLocResInternalFacesLocalElem[i] = startLocResInternalFacesLocalElem[i-1];
494  }
495 
496  /* Set the uninitialized values of startLocResInternalFacesWithHaloElem. */
497  startLocResInternalFacesWithHaloElem[0] = startLocResInternalFacesLocalElem[nTimeLevels];
498 
499  for(unsigned short i=1; i<=nTimeLevels; ++i) {
500  if(startLocResInternalFacesWithHaloElem[i] == 0)
501  startLocResInternalFacesWithHaloElem[i] = startLocResInternalFacesWithHaloElem[i-1];
502  }
503 
504  /* The physical boundary faces. Exclude the periodic boundaries,
505  because these are not physical boundaries. */
506  for(unsigned short iMarker=0; iMarker<nMarker; ++iMarker) {
507  startLocResFacesMarkers[iMarker].assign(nTimeLevels+1, 0);
508  startLocResFacesMarkers[iMarker][0] = sizeVecResFaces;
509 
510  if( !(boundaries[iMarker].periodicBoundary) ) {
511 
512  /* Easier storage of the variables for this boundary. */
513  const unsigned long nSurfElem = boundaries[iMarker].surfElem.size();
514  const CSurfaceElementFEM *surfElem = boundaries[iMarker].surfElem.data();
515 
516  /*--- Loop over the surface elements and update the required data. ---*/
517  for(unsigned long i=0; i<nSurfElem; ++i) {
518  const unsigned short ind = surfElem[i].indStandardElement;
519  const unsigned short nDOFsFace = standardBoundaryFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsFace();
520 
521  /* The terms that only contribute to the DOFs located on the face. */
522  sizeVecResFaces += nDOFsFace;
523  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace; ++j)
524  ++nEntriesResFaces[surfElem[i].DOFsSolFace[j]+1];
525 
526  /* The symmetrizing terms, if present, contribute to all
527  the DOFs of the adjacent elements. */
528  if( symmetrizingTermsPresent ) {
529  const unsigned short nDOFsElem = standardBoundaryFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsElem();
530 
531  sizeVecResFaces += nDOFsElem;
532  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem; ++j)
533  ++nEntriesResFaces[surfElem[i].DOFsSolElement[j]+1];
534  }
535 
536  /* Determine the time level of the adjacent element and store the position of the
537  residual in the appropriate entry. */
538  const unsigned short timeLevel = volElem[surfElem[i].volElemID].timeLevel;
539  startLocResFacesMarkers[iMarker][timeLevel+1] = sizeVecResFaces;
540  }
541  }
542 
543  /* Set the unitialized values of startLocResFacesMarkers[iMarker]. */
544  for(unsigned short i=1; i<=nTimeLevels; ++i) {
545  if(startLocResFacesMarkers[iMarker][i] == 0)
546  startLocResFacesMarkers[iMarker][i] = startLocResFacesMarkers[iMarker][i-1];
547  }
548  }
549 
550  /*--- Put nEntriesResFaces and nEntriesResAdjFaces in cumulative storage
551  format and allocate the memory for entriesResFaces, entriesResAdjFaces
552  and VecResFaces. ---*/
553  for(unsigned long i=0; i<nDOFsLocTot; ++i) {
554  nEntriesResFaces[i+1] += nEntriesResFaces[i];
555  nEntriesResAdjFaces[i+1] += nEntriesResAdjFaces[i];
556  }
557 
558  entriesResFaces.resize(nEntriesResFaces[nDOFsLocTot]);
559  entriesResAdjFaces.resize(nEntriesResAdjFaces[nDOFsLocTot]);
560  VecResFaces.resize(nVar*sizeVecResFaces);
561 
562  /*--- Repeat the loops over the internal and boundary faces, but now store
563  the entries in entriesResFaces and entriesResAdjFaces. A counter
564  variable is needed to keep track of the appropriate location in
565  entriesResFaces and entriesResAdjFaces. ---*/
566  vector<unsigned long> counterEntries = nEntriesResFaces;
567  vector<unsigned long> counterEntriesAdj = nEntriesResAdjFaces;
568 
569  /* First the loop over the internal matching faces. */
570  sizeVecResFaces = 0;
571  for(unsigned long i=0; i<nMatchingInternalFacesWithHaloElem[nTimeLevels]; ++i) {
572 
573  /* Determine the time level of the face. */
574  const unsigned long elem0 = matchingInternalFaces[i].elemID0;
575  const unsigned long elem1 = matchingInternalFaces[i].elemID1;
576  const unsigned short timeLevel = min(volElem[elem0].timeLevel,
577  volElem[elem1].timeLevel);
578 
579  /* The terms that only contribute to the DOFs located on the face. */
580  const unsigned short ind = matchingInternalFaces[i].indStandardElement;
581  const unsigned short nDOFsFace0 = standardMatchingFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsFaceSide0();
582  const unsigned short nDOFsFace1 = standardMatchingFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsFaceSide1();
583 
584  if(timeLevel == volElem[elem0].timeLevel) {
585  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace0; ++j) {
586  const unsigned long jj = counterEntries[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolFaceSide0[j]]++;
587  entriesResFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
588  }
589  }
590  else {
591  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace0; ++j) {
592  const unsigned long jj = counterEntriesAdj[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolFaceSide0[j]]++;
593  entriesResAdjFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
594  }
595  }
596 
597  if(timeLevel == volElem[elem1].timeLevel) {
598  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace1; ++j) {
599  const unsigned long jj = counterEntries[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolFaceSide1[j]]++;
600  entriesResFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
601  }
602  }
603  else {
604  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace1; ++j) {
605  const unsigned long jj = counterEntriesAdj[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolFaceSide1[j]]++;
606  entriesResAdjFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
607  }
608  }
609 
610  /* The symmetrizing terms, if present, contribute to all
611  the DOFs of the adjacent elements. */
612  if( symmetrizingTermsPresent ) {
613  const unsigned short nDOFsElem0 = standardMatchingFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsElemSide0();
614  const unsigned short nDOFsElem1 = standardMatchingFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsElemSide1();
615 
616  if(timeLevel == volElem[elem0].timeLevel) {
617  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem0; ++j) {
618  const unsigned long jj = counterEntries[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolElementSide0[j]]++;
619  entriesResFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
620  }
621  }
622  else {
623  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem0; ++j) {
624  const unsigned long jj = counterEntriesAdj[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolElementSide0[j]]++;
625  entriesResAdjFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
626  }
627  }
628 
629  if(timeLevel == volElem[elem1].timeLevel) {
630  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem1; ++j) {
631  const unsigned long jj = counterEntries[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolElementSide1[j]]++;
632  entriesResFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
633  }
634  }
635  else {
636  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem1; ++j) {
637  const unsigned long jj = counterEntriesAdj[matchingInternalFaces[i].DOFsSolElementSide1[j]]++;
638  entriesResAdjFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
639  }
640  }
641  }
642  }
643 
644  /* And the physical boundary faces. Exclude the periodic boundaries,
645  because these are not physical boundaries. */
646  for(unsigned short iMarker=0; iMarker<nMarker; ++iMarker) {
647  if( !(boundaries[iMarker].periodicBoundary) ) {
648 
649  /* Easier storage of the variables for this boundary. */
650  const unsigned long nSurfElem = boundaries[iMarker].surfElem.size();
651  const CSurfaceElementFEM *surfElem = boundaries[iMarker].surfElem.data();
652 
653  /*--- Loop over the surface elements to set entriesResFaces. ---*/
654  for(unsigned long i=0; i<nSurfElem; ++i) {
655 
656  /* The terms that only contribute to the DOFs located on the face. */
657  const unsigned short ind = surfElem[i].indStandardElement;
658  const unsigned short nDOFsFace = standardBoundaryFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsFace();
659 
660  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsFace; ++j) {
661  unsigned long jj = counterEntries[surfElem[i].DOFsSolFace[j]]++;
662  entriesResFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
663  }
664 
665  /* The symmetrizing terms, if present, contribute to all
666  the DOFs of the adjacent elements. */
667  if( symmetrizingTermsPresent ) {
668  const unsigned short nDOFsElem = standardBoundaryFacesSol[ind].GetNDOFsElem();
669 
670  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nDOFsElem; ++j) {
671  unsigned long jj = counterEntries[surfElem[i].DOFsSolElement[j]]++;
672  entriesResFaces[jj] = sizeVecResFaces++;
673  }
674  }
675  }
676  }
677  }
678 
679  /*--- Start the solution from the free-stream state. This is overruled
680  when a restart takes place. ---*/
681  unsigned long ii = 0;
682  for(unsigned long i=0; i<nDOFsLocOwned; ++i) {
683  for(unsigned short j=0; j<nVar; ++j, ++ii) {
684  VecSolDOFs[ii] = ConsVarFreeStream[j];
685  }
686  }
687 
688  /* Check if the exact Jacobian of the spatial discretization must be
689  determined. If so, the color of each DOF must be determined, which
690  is converted to the DOFs for each color. */
691  if( config->GetJacobian_Spatial_Discretization_Only() ) {
692 
693  /* Write a message that the graph coloring is performed. */
694  if(rank == MASTER_NODE)
695  cout << "Creating the vertex colors of the graph. " << std::endl;
696 
697  /* Determine the graph of the stencil of every local DOF. */
698  DetermineGraphDOFs(DGGeometry, config);
699 
700  /* Carry out the vertex coloring of the graph. */
701  CGraphColoringStructure graphColoring;
702  vector<int> colorLocalDOFs;
703  graphColoring.GraphVertexColoring(config, nDOFsPerRank, nonZeroEntriesJacobian,
704  nGlobalColors, colorLocalDOFs);
705 
706  /* Write a message that the all volume DOFs have been colored. */
707  if(rank == MASTER_NODE)
708  cout << "There are " << nGlobalColors
709  << " colors present in the graph for " << nDOFsPerRank.back()
710  << " DOFs." << std::endl;
711 
712  /* Determine the meta data needed for the computation of the Jacobian. */
713  MetaDataJacobianComputation(DGGeometry, colorLocalDOFs);
714  }
715 
716  /* Set up the persistent communication for the conservative variables and
717  the reverse communication for the residuals of the halo elements. */
718  Prepare_MPI_Communication(DGGeometry, config);
719 
720  /* Set up the list of tasks to be carried out in the computational expensive
721  part of the code. For the Runge-Kutta schemes this is typically the
722  computation of the spatial residual, while for ADER this list contains
723  the tasks to be done for one space time step. */
724  SetUpTaskList(config);
725 
726  /*--- Add the solver name (max 8 characters) ---*/
727  SolverName = "DG FLOW";
728 }
729 
730 CFEM_DG_EulerSolver::~CFEM_DG_EulerSolver(void) {
731 
732  delete FluidModel;
733  delete blasFunctions;
734 
735  /*--- Array deallocation ---*/
736  delete [] CD_Inv;
737  delete [] CL_Inv;
738  delete [] CSF_Inv;
739  delete [] CMx_Inv;
740  delete [] CMy_Inv;
741  delete [] CMz_Inv;
742  delete [] CFx_Inv;
743  delete [] CFy_Inv;
744  delete [] CFz_Inv;
745  delete [] Surface_CL_Inv;
746  delete [] Surface_CD_Inv;
747  delete [] Surface_CSF_Inv;
748  delete [] Surface_CEff_Inv;
749  delete [] Surface_CFx_Inv;
750  delete [] Surface_CFy_Inv;
751  delete [] Surface_CFz_Inv;
752  delete [] Surface_CMx_Inv;
753  delete [] Surface_CMy_Inv;
754  delete [] Surface_CMz_Inv;
755  delete [] Surface_CL;
756  delete [] Surface_CD;
757  delete [] Surface_CSF;
758  delete [] Surface_CEff;
759  delete [] Surface_CFx;
760  delete [] Surface_CFy;
761  delete [] Surface_CFz;
762  delete [] Surface_CMx;
763  delete [] Surface_CMy;
764  delete [] Surface_CMz;
765  delete [] CEff_Inv;
766 
767 }
768 
769 void CFEM_DG_EulerSolver::SetNondimensionalization(CConfig *config,
770  unsigned short iMesh,
771  const bool writeOutput) {
772 
773  su2double Temperature_FreeStream = 0.0, Mach2Vel_FreeStream = 0.0, ModVel_FreeStream = 0.0,
774  Energy_FreeStream = 0.0, ModVel_FreeStreamND = 0.0, Velocity_Reynolds = 0.0,
775  Omega_FreeStream = 0.0, Omega_FreeStreamND = 0.0, Viscosity_FreeStream = 0.0,
776  Density_FreeStream = 0.0, Pressure_FreeStream = 0.0, Tke_FreeStream = 0.0,
777  Length_Ref = 0.0, Density_Ref = 0.0, Pressure_Ref = 0.0, Velocity_Ref = 0.0,
778  Temperature_Ref = 0.0, Time_Ref = 0.0, Omega_Ref = 0.0, Force_Ref = 0.0,
779  Gas_Constant_Ref = 0.0, Viscosity_Ref = 0.0, Conductivity_Ref = 0.0, Energy_Ref= 0.0,
780  Froude = 0.0, Pressure_FreeStreamND = 0.0, Density_FreeStreamND = 0.0,
781  Temperature_FreeStreamND = 0.0, Gas_ConstantND = 0.0,
782  Velocity_FreeStreamND[3] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0}, Viscosity_FreeStreamND = 0.0,
783  Tke_FreeStreamND = 0.0, Energy_FreeStreamND = 0.0,
784  Total_UnstTimeND = 0.0, Delta_UnstTimeND = 0.0;
785 
786  unsigned short iDim;
787 
788  /*--- Local variables ---*/
789 
790  su2double Alpha = config->GetAoA()*PI_NUMBER/180.0;
791  su2double Beta = config->GetAoS()*PI_NUMBER/180.0;
792  su2double Mach = config->GetMach();
793  su2double Reynolds = config->GetReynolds();
794  bool unsteady = (config->GetTime_Marching() != TIME_MARCHING::STEADY);
795  bool viscous = config->GetViscous();
796  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
797  bool turbulent = (config->GetKind_Solver() == MAIN_SOLVER::FEM_RANS) || (config->GetKind_Solver() == MAIN_SOLVER::FEM_LES);
798  bool tkeNeeded = ((turbulent) && ((config->GetKind_Turb_Model() == TURB_MODEL::SST) ));
799  bool free_stream_temp = (config->GetKind_FreeStreamOption() == FREESTREAM_OPTION::TEMPERATURE_FS);
800  bool reynolds_init = (config->GetKind_InitOption() == REYNOLDS);
801 
802  /*--- Compute the Free Stream velocity, using the Mach number ---*/
803 
804  Pressure_FreeStream = config->GetPressure_FreeStream();
805  Density_FreeStream = config->GetDensity_FreeStream();
806  Temperature_FreeStream = config->GetTemperature_FreeStream();
807 
808  /*--- The dimensional viscosity is needed to determine the free-stream conditions.
809  To accomplish this, simply set the non-dimensional coefficients to the
810  dimensional ones. This will be overruled later.---*/
811 
812  config->SetTemperature_Ref(1.0);
813  config->SetViscosity_Ref(1.0);
814  config->SetConductivity_Ref(1.0);
815 
816  switch (config->GetKind_FluidModel()) {
817 
818  case STANDARD_AIR:
819 
820  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) config->SetGas_Constant(287.058);
821  else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) config->SetGas_Constant(1716.49);
822 
823  FluidModel = new CIdealGas(1.4, config->GetGas_Constant(), config->GetCompute_Entropy());
824  if (free_stream_temp) {
825  FluidModel->SetTDState_PT(Pressure_FreeStream, Temperature_FreeStream);
826  Density_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetDensity();
827  config->SetDensity_FreeStream(Density_FreeStream);
828  }
829  else {
830  FluidModel->SetTDState_Prho(Pressure_FreeStream, Density_FreeStream );
831  Temperature_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetTemperature();
832  config->SetTemperature_FreeStream(Temperature_FreeStream);
833  }
834  break;
835 
836  case IDEAL_GAS:
837 
838  FluidModel = new CIdealGas(Gamma, config->GetGas_Constant(), config->GetCompute_Entropy());
839  if (free_stream_temp) {
840  FluidModel->SetTDState_PT(Pressure_FreeStream, Temperature_FreeStream);
841  Density_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetDensity();
842  config->SetDensity_FreeStream(Density_FreeStream);
843  }
844  else {
845  FluidModel->SetTDState_Prho(Pressure_FreeStream, Density_FreeStream );
846  Temperature_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetTemperature();
847  config->SetTemperature_FreeStream(Temperature_FreeStream);
848  }
849  break;
850 
851  case VW_GAS:
852 
853  FluidModel = new CVanDerWaalsGas(Gamma, config->GetGas_Constant(),
854  config->GetPressure_Critical(), config->GetTemperature_Critical());
855  if (free_stream_temp) {
856  FluidModel->SetTDState_PT(Pressure_FreeStream, Temperature_FreeStream);
857  Density_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetDensity();
858  config->SetDensity_FreeStream(Density_FreeStream);
859  }
860  else {
861  FluidModel->SetTDState_Prho(Pressure_FreeStream, Density_FreeStream );
862  Temperature_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetTemperature();
863  config->SetTemperature_FreeStream(Temperature_FreeStream);
864  }
865  break;
866 
867  case PR_GAS:
868 
869  FluidModel = new CPengRobinson(Gamma, config->GetGas_Constant(), config->GetPressure_Critical(),
870  config->GetTemperature_Critical(), config->GetAcentric_Factor());
871  if (free_stream_temp) {
872  FluidModel->SetTDState_PT(Pressure_FreeStream, Temperature_FreeStream);
873  Density_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetDensity();
874  config->SetDensity_FreeStream(Density_FreeStream);
875  }
876  else {
877  FluidModel->SetTDState_Prho(Pressure_FreeStream, Density_FreeStream );
878  Temperature_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetTemperature();
879  config->SetTemperature_FreeStream(Temperature_FreeStream);
880  }
881  break;
882 
883  case COOLPROP:
884 
885  FluidModel = new CCoolProp(config->GetFluid_Name());
886  if (free_stream_temp) {
887  FluidModel->SetTDState_PT(Pressure_FreeStream, Temperature_FreeStream);
888  Density_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetDensity();
889  config->SetDensity_FreeStream(Density_FreeStream);
890  }
891  else {
892  FluidModel->SetTDState_Prho(Pressure_FreeStream, Density_FreeStream );
893  Temperature_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetTemperature();
894  config->SetTemperature_FreeStream(Temperature_FreeStream);
895  }
896  break;
897 
898  }
899 
900  Mach2Vel_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetSoundSpeed();
901 
902  /*--- Compute the Free Stream velocity, using the Mach number ---*/
903 
904  if (nDim == 2) {
905  config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[0] = cos(Alpha)*Mach*Mach2Vel_FreeStream;
906  config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[1] = sin(Alpha)*Mach*Mach2Vel_FreeStream;
907  }
908  if (nDim == 3) {
909  config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[0] = cos(Alpha)*cos(Beta)*Mach*Mach2Vel_FreeStream;
910  config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[1] = sin(Beta)*Mach*Mach2Vel_FreeStream;
911  config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[2] = sin(Alpha)*cos(Beta)*Mach*Mach2Vel_FreeStream;
912  }
913 
914  /*--- Compute the modulus of the free stream velocity ---*/
915 
916  ModVel_FreeStream = 0.0;
917  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
918  ModVel_FreeStream += config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[iDim]*config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[iDim];
919  ModVel_FreeStream = sqrt(ModVel_FreeStream); config->SetModVel_FreeStream(ModVel_FreeStream);
920 
921  /*--- Viscous initialization ---*/
922 
923  if (viscous) {
924 
925  /*--- Reynolds based initialization ---*/
926 
927  if (reynolds_init) {
928 
929  /*--- First, check if there is mesh motion. If yes, use the Mach
930  number relative to the body to initialize the flow. ---*/
931 
932  if (grid_movement) Velocity_Reynolds = config->GetMach_Motion()*Mach2Vel_FreeStream;
933  else Velocity_Reynolds = ModVel_FreeStream;
934 
935  /*--- For viscous flows, pressure will be computed from a density
936  that is found from the Reynolds number. The viscosity is computed
937  from the dimensional version of Sutherland's law or the constant
938  viscosity, depending on the input option.---*/
939 
940  FluidModel->SetLaminarViscosityModel(config);
941 
942  Viscosity_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetLaminarViscosity();
943  config->SetViscosity_FreeStream(Viscosity_FreeStream);
944 
945  Density_FreeStream = Reynolds*Viscosity_FreeStream/(Velocity_Reynolds*config->GetLength_Reynolds());
946  config->SetDensity_FreeStream(Density_FreeStream);
947  FluidModel->SetTDState_rhoT(Density_FreeStream, Temperature_FreeStream);
948  Pressure_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetPressure();
949  config->SetPressure_FreeStream(Pressure_FreeStream);
950  Energy_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetStaticEnergy() + 0.5*ModVel_FreeStream*ModVel_FreeStream;
951 
952  }
953 
954  /*--- Thermodynamics quantities based initialization ---*/
955 
956  else {
957 
958  FluidModel->SetLaminarViscosityModel(config);
959  Viscosity_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetLaminarViscosity();
960  config->SetViscosity_FreeStream(Viscosity_FreeStream);
961  Energy_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetStaticEnergy() + 0.5*ModVel_FreeStream*ModVel_FreeStream;
962 
963  }
964 
965  /*--- Turbulence kinetic energy ---*/
966 
967  Tke_FreeStream = 3.0/2.0*(ModVel_FreeStream*ModVel_FreeStream*config->GetTurbulenceIntensity_FreeStream()*config->GetTurbulenceIntensity_FreeStream());
968 
969  }
970  else {
971 
972  /*--- For inviscid flow, energy is calculated from the specified
973  FreeStream quantities using the proper gas law. ---*/
974 
975  Energy_FreeStream = FluidModel->GetStaticEnergy() + 0.5*ModVel_FreeStream*ModVel_FreeStream;
976 
977  }
978 
979  /*-- Compute the freestream energy. ---*/
980 
981  if (tkeNeeded) { Energy_FreeStream += Tke_FreeStream; }; config->SetEnergy_FreeStream(Energy_FreeStream);
982 
983  /*--- Compute non dimensional quantities. By definition,
984  Lref is one because we have converted the grid to meters. ---*/
985 
986  if (config->GetRef_NonDim() == DIMENSIONAL) {
987  Pressure_Ref = 1.0;
988  Density_Ref = 1.0;
989  Temperature_Ref = 1.0;
990  }
991  else if (config->GetRef_NonDim() == FREESTREAM_PRESS_EQ_ONE) {
992  Pressure_Ref = Pressure_FreeStream; // Pressure_FreeStream = 1.0
993  Density_Ref = Density_FreeStream; // Density_FreeStream = 1.0
994  Temperature_Ref = Temperature_FreeStream; // Temperature_FreeStream = 1.0
995  }
996  else if (config->GetRef_NonDim() == FREESTREAM_VEL_EQ_MACH) {
997  Pressure_Ref = Gamma*Pressure_FreeStream; // Pressure_FreeStream = 1.0/Gamma
998  Density_Ref = Density_FreeStream; // Density_FreeStream = 1.0
999  Temperature_Ref = Temperature_FreeStream; // Temp_FreeStream = 1.0
1000  }
1001  else if (config->GetRef_NonDim() == FREESTREAM_VEL_EQ_ONE) {
1002  Pressure_Ref = Mach*Mach*Gamma*Pressure_FreeStream; // Pressure_FreeStream = 1.0/(Gamma*(M_inf)^2)
1003  Density_Ref = Density_FreeStream; // Density_FreeStream = 1.0
1004  Temperature_Ref = Temperature_FreeStream; // Temp_FreeStream = 1.0
1005  }
1006  config->SetPressure_Ref(Pressure_Ref);
1007  config->SetDensity_Ref(Density_Ref);
1008  config->SetTemperature_Ref(Temperature_Ref);
1009 
1010  Length_Ref = 1.0; config->SetLength_Ref(Length_Ref);
1011  Velocity_Ref = sqrt(config->GetPressure_Ref()/config->GetDensity_Ref()); config->SetVelocity_Ref(Velocity_Ref);
1012  Time_Ref = Length_Ref/Velocity_Ref; config->SetTime_Ref(Time_Ref);
1013  Omega_Ref = Velocity_Ref/Length_Ref; config->SetOmega_Ref(Omega_Ref);
1014  Force_Ref = Velocity_Ref*Velocity_Ref/Length_Ref; config->SetForce_Ref(Force_Ref);
1015  Gas_Constant_Ref = Velocity_Ref*Velocity_Ref/config->GetTemperature_Ref(); config->SetGas_Constant_Ref(Gas_Constant_Ref);
1016  Viscosity_Ref = config->GetDensity_Ref()*Velocity_Ref*Length_Ref; config->SetViscosity_Ref(Viscosity_Ref);
1017  Conductivity_Ref = Viscosity_Ref*Gas_Constant_Ref; config->SetConductivity_Ref(Conductivity_Ref);
1018  Froude = ModVel_FreeStream/sqrt(STANDARD_GRAVITY*Length_Ref); config->SetFroude(Froude);
1019 
1020  /*--- Divide by reference values, to compute the non-dimensional free-stream values ---*/
1021 
1022  Pressure_FreeStreamND = Pressure_FreeStream/config->GetPressure_Ref(); config->SetPressure_FreeStreamND(Pressure_FreeStreamND);
1023  Density_FreeStreamND = Density_FreeStream/config->GetDensity_Ref(); config->SetDensity_FreeStreamND(Density_FreeStreamND);
1024 
1025  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
1026  Velocity_FreeStreamND[iDim] = config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[iDim]/Velocity_Ref; config->SetVelocity_FreeStreamND(Velocity_FreeStreamND[iDim], iDim);
1027  }
1028 
1029  Temperature_FreeStreamND = Temperature_FreeStream/config->GetTemperature_Ref(); config->SetTemperature_FreeStreamND(Temperature_FreeStreamND);
1030 
1031  Gas_ConstantND = config->GetGas_Constant()/Gas_Constant_Ref; config->SetGas_ConstantND(Gas_ConstantND);
1032 
1033 
1034  ModVel_FreeStreamND = 0.0;
1035  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) ModVel_FreeStreamND += Velocity_FreeStreamND[iDim]*Velocity_FreeStreamND[iDim];
1036  ModVel_FreeStreamND = sqrt(ModVel_FreeStreamND); config->SetModVel_FreeStreamND(ModVel_FreeStreamND);
1037 
1038  Viscosity_FreeStreamND = Viscosity_FreeStream / Viscosity_Ref; config->SetViscosity_FreeStreamND(Viscosity_FreeStreamND);
1039 
1040  Tke_FreeStream = 3.0/2.0*(ModVel_FreeStream*ModVel_FreeStream*config->GetTurbulenceIntensity_FreeStream()*config->GetTurbulenceIntensity_FreeStream());
1041  config->SetTke_FreeStream(Tke_FreeStream);
1042 
1043  Tke_FreeStreamND = 3.0/2.0*(ModVel_FreeStreamND*ModVel_FreeStreamND*config->GetTurbulenceIntensity_FreeStream()*config->GetTurbulenceIntensity_FreeStream());
1044  config->SetTke_FreeStreamND(Tke_FreeStreamND);
1045 
1046  Omega_FreeStream = Density_FreeStream*Tke_FreeStream/max((Viscosity_FreeStream*config->GetTurb2LamViscRatio_FreeStream()), 1.e-25);
1047  config->SetOmega_FreeStream(Omega_FreeStream);
1048 
1049  Omega_FreeStreamND = Density_FreeStreamND*Tke_FreeStreamND/max((Viscosity_FreeStreamND*config->GetTurb2LamViscRatio_FreeStream()), 1.e-25);
1050  config->SetOmega_FreeStreamND(Omega_FreeStreamND);
1051 
1052  /*--- Initialize the dimensionless Fluid Model that will be used to solve the dimensionless problem ---*/
1053 
1054  /*--- Delete the original (dimensional) FluidModel object before replacing. ---*/
1055 
1056  delete FluidModel;
1057 
1058  switch (config->GetKind_FluidModel()) {
1059 
1060  case STANDARD_AIR:
1061  FluidModel = new CIdealGas(1.4, Gas_ConstantND, config->GetCompute_Entropy());
1062  FluidModel->SetEnergy_Prho(Pressure_FreeStreamND, Density_FreeStreamND);
1063  break;
1064 
1065  case IDEAL_GAS:
1066  FluidModel = new CIdealGas(Gamma, Gas_ConstantND, config->GetCompute_Entropy());
1067  FluidModel->SetEnergy_Prho(Pressure_FreeStreamND, Density_FreeStreamND);
1068  break;
1069 
1070  case VW_GAS:
1071  FluidModel = new CVanDerWaalsGas(Gamma, Gas_ConstantND, config->GetPressure_Critical() /config->GetPressure_Ref(),
1072  config->GetTemperature_Critical()/config->GetTemperature_Ref());
1073  FluidModel->SetEnergy_Prho(Pressure_FreeStreamND, Density_FreeStreamND);
1074  break;
1075 
1076  case PR_GAS:
1077  FluidModel = new CPengRobinson(Gamma, Gas_ConstantND, config->GetPressure_Critical() /config->GetPressure_Ref(),
1078  config->GetTemperature_Critical()/config->GetTemperature_Ref(), config->GetAcentric_Factor());
1079  FluidModel->SetEnergy_Prho(Pressure_FreeStreamND, Density_FreeStreamND);
1080  break;
1081 
1082  case COOLPROP:
1083  FluidModel = new CCoolProp(config->GetFluid_Name());
1084  FluidModel->SetEnergy_Prho(Pressure_FreeStreamND, Density_FreeStreamND);
1085  break;
1086  }
1087 
1088  Energy_FreeStreamND = FluidModel->GetStaticEnergy() + 0.5*ModVel_FreeStreamND*ModVel_FreeStreamND;
1089 
1090  if (viscous) {
1091  FluidModel->SetLaminarViscosityModel(config);
1092  FluidModel->SetThermalConductivityModel(config);
1093  }
1094 
1095  if (tkeNeeded) { Energy_FreeStreamND += Tke_FreeStreamND; }; config->SetEnergy_FreeStreamND(Energy_FreeStreamND);
1096 
1097  Energy_Ref = Energy_FreeStream/Energy_FreeStreamND; config->SetEnergy_Ref(Energy_Ref);
1098 
1099  Total_UnstTimeND = config->GetTotal_UnstTime() / Time_Ref; config->SetTotal_UnstTimeND(Total_UnstTimeND);
1100  Delta_UnstTimeND = config->GetDelta_UnstTime() / Time_Ref; config->SetDelta_UnstTimeND(Delta_UnstTimeND);
1101 
1102  /*--- Write output to the console if this is required and if this is the master node and first domain ---*/
1103 
1104  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (iMesh == MESH_0) && writeOutput) {
1105 
1106  cout.precision(6);
1107 
1108  if (viscous) {
1109  cout << "Viscous flow: Computing pressure using the ideal gas law" << endl;
1110  cout << "based on the free-stream temperature and a density computed" << endl;
1111  cout << "from the Reynolds number." << endl;
1112  } else {
1113  cout << "Inviscid flow: Computing density based on free-stream" << endl;
1114  cout << "temperature and pressure using the ideal gas law." << endl;
1115  }
1116 
1117  if (grid_movement) cout << "Force coefficients computed using MACH_MOTION." << endl;
1118  else cout << "Force coefficients computed using free-stream values." << endl;
1119 
1120  stringstream NonDimTableOut, ModelTableOut;
1121  stringstream Unit;
1122 
1123  cout << endl;
1124  PrintingToolbox::CTablePrinter ModelTable(&ModelTableOut);
1125  ModelTableOut <<"-- Models:"<< endl;
1126 
1127  ModelTable.AddColumn("Viscosity Model", 25);
1128  ModelTable.AddColumn("Conductivity Model", 26);
1129  ModelTable.AddColumn("Fluid Model", 25);
1130  ModelTable.SetAlign(PrintingToolbox::CTablePrinter::RIGHT);
1131  ModelTable.PrintHeader();
1132 
1133  PrintingToolbox::CTablePrinter NonDimTable(&NonDimTableOut);
1134  NonDimTable.AddColumn("Name", 22);
1135  NonDimTable.AddColumn("Dim. value", 14);
1136  NonDimTable.AddColumn("Ref. value", 14);
1137  NonDimTable.AddColumn("Unit", 10);
1138  NonDimTable.AddColumn("Non-dim. value", 14);
1139  NonDimTable.SetAlign(PrintingToolbox::CTablePrinter::RIGHT);
1140 
1141  NonDimTableOut <<"-- Fluid properties:"<< endl;
1142 
1143  NonDimTable.PrintHeader();
1144 
1145  if (viscous) {
1146 
1147  switch(config->GetKind_ViscosityModel()){
1148  case VISCOSITYMODEL::CONSTANT:
1149  ModelTable << "CONSTANT_VISCOSITY";
1150  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "N.s/m^2";
1151  else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "lbf.s/ft^2";
1152  NonDimTable << "Viscosity" << config->GetMu_Constant() << config->GetMu_Constant()/config->GetMu_ConstantND() << Unit.str() << config->GetMu_ConstantND();
1153  Unit.str("");
1154  NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1155  break;
1156 
1157  case VISCOSITYMODEL::COOLPROP:
1158  ModelTable << "COOLPROP";
1159  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "N.s/m^2";
1160  else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "lbf.s/ft^2";
1161  NonDimTable << "Viscosity" << "--" << "--" << Unit.str() << config->GetMu_ConstantND();
1162  Unit.str("");
1163  NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1164  break;
1165 
1166  case VISCOSITYMODEL::SUTHERLAND:
1167  ModelTable << "SUTHERLAND";
1168  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "N.s/m^2";
1169  else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "lbf.s/ft^2";
1170  NonDimTable << "Ref. Viscosity" << config->GetMu_Ref() << config->GetViscosity_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetMu_RefND();
1171  Unit.str("");
1172  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "K";
1173  else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "R";
1174  NonDimTable << "Sutherland Temp." << config->GetMu_Temperature_Ref() << config->GetTemperature_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetMu_Temperature_RefND();
1175  Unit.str("");
1176  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "K";
1177  else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "R";
1178  NonDimTable << "Sutherland Const." << config->GetMu_S() << config->GetTemperature_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetMu_SND();
1179  Unit.str("");
1180  NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1181  break;
1182 
1183  default:
1184  break;
1185 
1186  }
1187  switch(config->GetKind_ConductivityModel()){
1188  case CONDUCTIVITYMODEL::CONSTANT_PRANDTL:
1189  ModelTable << "CONSTANT_PRANDTL";
1190  NonDimTable << "Prandtl (Lam.)" << "-" << "-" << "-" << config->GetPrandtl_Lam();
1191  Unit.str("");
1192  NonDimTable << "Prandtl (Turb.)" << "-" << "-" << "-" << config->GetPrandtl_Turb();
1193  Unit.str("");
1194  NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1195  break;
1196 
1197  case CONDUCTIVITYMODEL::CONSTANT:
1198  ModelTable << "CONSTANT";
1199  Unit << "W/m^2.K";
1200  NonDimTable << "Molecular Cond." << config->GetThermal_Conductivity_Constant() << config->GetThermal_Conductivity_Constant()/config->GetThermal_Conductivity_ConstantND() << Unit.str() << config->GetThermal_Conductivity_ConstantND();
1201  Unit.str("");
1202  NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1203  break;
1204 
1205  case CONDUCTIVITYMODEL::COOLPROP:
1206  ModelTable << "COOLPROP";
1207  Unit << "W/m^2.K";
1208  NonDimTable << "Molecular Cond." << "--" << "--" << Unit.str() << config->GetThermal_Conductivity_ConstantND();
1209  Unit.str("");
1210  NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1211  break;
1212 
1213  default:
1214  break;
1215 
1216  }
1217  } else {
1218  ModelTable << "-" << "-";
1219  }
1220 
1221  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "N.m/kg.K";
1222  else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "lbf.ft/slug.R";
1223  if (config->GetKind_FluidModel() == COOLPROP) {
1224  CCoolProp auxFluidModel(config->GetFluid_Name());
1225  NonDimTable << "Gas Constant" << auxFluidModel.GetGas_Constant() << config->GetGas_Constant_Ref()
1226  << Unit.str() << auxFluidModel.GetGas_Constant()/config->GetGas_Constant_Ref();
1227  }
1228  else {
1229  NonDimTable << "Gas Constant" << config->GetGas_Constant() << config->GetGas_Constant_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetGas_ConstantND();
1230  }
1231  Unit.str("");
1232  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "N.m/kg.K";
1233  else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "lbf.ft/slug.R";
1234  if (config->GetKind_FluidModel() == COOLPROP) {
1235  NonDimTable << "Spec. Heat Ratio" << "-" << "-" << "-" << "-";
1236  }
1237  else {
1238  NonDimTable << "Spec. Heat Ratio" << "-" << "-" << "-" << Gamma;
1239  }
1240  Unit.str("");
1241 
1242  switch(config->GetKind_FluidModel()){
1243  case STANDARD_AIR:
1244  ModelTable << "STANDARD_AIR";
1245  break;
1246  case IDEAL_GAS:
1247  ModelTable << "IDEAL_GAS";
1248  break;
1249  case VW_GAS:
1250  ModelTable << "VW_GAS";
1251  break;
1252  case PR_GAS:
1253  ModelTable << "PR_GAS";
1254  break;
1255  case COOLPROP:
1256  ModelTable << "CoolProp library";
1257  break;
1258  }
1259 
1260  if (config->GetKind_FluidModel() == VW_GAS || config->GetKind_FluidModel() == PR_GAS){
1261  NonDimTable << "Critical Pressure" << config->GetPressure_Critical() << config->GetPressure_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetPressure_Critical() /config->GetPressure_Ref();
1262  Unit.str("");
1263  Unit << "K";
1264  NonDimTable << "Critical Temperature" << config->GetTemperature_Critical() << config->GetTemperature_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetTemperature_Critical() /config->GetTemperature_Ref();
1265  Unit.str("");
1266  }
1267  if (config->GetKind_FluidModel() == COOLPROP) {
1268  CCoolProp auxFluidModel(config->GetFluid_Name());
1269  NonDimTable << "Critical Pressure" << auxFluidModel.GetPressure_Critical() << config->GetPressure_Ref() << Unit.str() << auxFluidModel.GetPressure_Critical() /config->GetPressure_Ref();
1270  Unit.str("");
1271  Unit << "K";
1272  NonDimTable << "Critical Temperature" << auxFluidModel.GetTemperature_Critical() << config->GetTemperature_Ref() << Unit.str() << auxFluidModel.GetTemperature_Critical() /config->GetTemperature_Ref();
1273  Unit.str("");
1274  }
1275  NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1276 
1277  NonDimTableOut <<"-- Initial and free-stream conditions:"<< endl;
1278 
1279  NonDimTable.PrintHeader();
1280 
1281  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "Pa";
1282  else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "psf";
1283  NonDimTable << "Static Pressure" << config->GetPressure_FreeStream() << config->GetPressure_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetPressure_FreeStreamND();
1284  Unit.str("");
1285  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "kg/m^3";
1286  else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "slug/ft^3";
1287  NonDimTable << "Density" << config->GetDensity_FreeStream() << config->GetDensity_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetDensity_FreeStreamND();
1288  Unit.str("");
1289  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "K";
1290  else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "R";
1291  NonDimTable << "Temperature" << config->GetTemperature_FreeStream() << config->GetTemperature_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetTemperature_FreeStreamND();
1292  Unit.str("");
1293  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "m^2/s^2";
1294  else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "ft^2/s^2";
1295  NonDimTable << "Total Energy" << config->GetEnergy_FreeStream() << config->GetEnergy_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetEnergy_FreeStreamND();
1296  Unit.str("");
1297  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "m/s";
1298  else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "ft/s";
1299  NonDimTable << "Velocity-X" << config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[0] << config->GetVelocity_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetVelocity_FreeStreamND()[0];
1300  NonDimTable << "Velocity-Y" << config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[1] << config->GetVelocity_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetVelocity_FreeStreamND()[1];
1301  if (nDim == 3) {
1302  NonDimTable << "Velocity-Z" << config->GetVelocity_FreeStream()[2] << config->GetVelocity_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetVelocity_FreeStreamND()[2];
1303  }
1304  NonDimTable << "Velocity Magnitude" << config->GetModVel_FreeStream() << config->GetVelocity_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetModVel_FreeStreamND();
1305  Unit.str("");
1306 
1307  if (viscous) {
1308  NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1309  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "N.s/m^2";
1310  else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "lbf.s/ft^2";
1311  NonDimTable << "Viscosity" << config->GetViscosity_FreeStream() << config->GetViscosity_Ref() << Unit.str() << config->GetViscosity_FreeStreamND();
1312  Unit.str("");
1313  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "W/m^2.K";
1314  else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "lbf/ft.s.R";
1315  NonDimTable << "Conductivity" << "-" << config->GetThermal_Conductivity_Ref() << Unit.str() << "-";
1316  Unit.str("");
1317  if (turbulent) {
1318  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "m^2/s^2";
1319  else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "ft^2/s^2";
1320  NonDimTable << "Turb. Kin. Energy" << config->GetTke_FreeStream() << config->GetTke_FreeStream()/config->GetTke_FreeStreamND() << Unit.str() << config->GetTke_FreeStreamND();
1321  Unit.str("");
1322  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) Unit << "1/s";
1323  else if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) Unit << "1/s";
1324  NonDimTable << "Spec. Dissipation" << config->GetOmega_FreeStream() << config->GetOmega_FreeStream()/config->GetOmega_FreeStreamND() << Unit.str() << config->GetOmega_FreeStreamND();
1325  Unit.str("");
1326  }
1327  }
1328 
1329  NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1330  NonDimTable << "Mach Number" << "-" << "-" << "-" << config->GetMach();
1331  if (viscous) {
1332  NonDimTable << "Reynolds Number" << "-" << "-" << "-" << config->GetReynolds();
1333  }
1334  NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1335  ModelTable.PrintFooter();
1336 
1337  if (unsteady){
1338  NonDimTableOut << "-- Unsteady conditions" << endl;
1339  NonDimTable.PrintHeader();
1340  NonDimTable << "Total Time" << config->GetMax_Time() << config->GetTime_Ref() << "s" << config->GetMax_Time()/config->GetTime_Ref();
1341  Unit.str("");
1342  NonDimTable << "Time Step" << config->GetTime_Step() << config->GetTime_Ref() << "s" << config->GetDelta_UnstTimeND();
1343  Unit.str("");
1344  NonDimTable.PrintFooter();
1345  }
1346 
1347  cout << ModelTableOut.str();
1348  cout << NonDimTableOut.str();
1349 
1350  }
1351 }
1352 
1353 void CFEM_DG_EulerSolver::DetermineGraphDOFs(const CMeshFEM *FEMGeometry,
1354  CConfig *config) {
1355 
1356  /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1357  /* Step 1: Determine the number of owned DOFs per rank in cumulative */
1358  /* storage format. */
1359  /*********************************************************************/
1360 
1361  /*--- Gather the number of DOFs from all ranks. */
1362  nDOFsPerRank.resize(size+1);
1363  nDOFsPerRank[0] = 0;
1364 
1365 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1366  SU2_MPI::Allgather(&nDOFsLocOwned, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, &nDOFsPerRank[1], 1,
1367  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
1368 #else
1369  nDOFsPerRank[1] = nDOFsLocOwned;
1370 #endif
1371 
1372  /*--- Put nDOFsPerRank in cumulative storage format. ---*/
1373  for(int i=0; i<size; ++i)
1374  nDOFsPerRank[i+1] += nDOFsPerRank[i];
1375 
1376  /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1377  /* Step 2: Determine the global numbering of the DOFs, especially */
1378  /* of the externals. */
1379  /*********************************************************************/
1380 
1381  /* Determine the global values of the locally owned DOFs. */
1382  vector<unsigned long> DOFsGlobalID(nDOFsLocTot);
1383  for(unsigned long i=0; i<nDOFsLocOwned; ++i)
1384  DOFsGlobalID[i] = nDOFsPerRank[rank] + i;
1385 
1386  /*--- Get the communication information from DG_Geometry. Note that for a
1387  FEM DG discretization the communication entities of FEMGeometry contain
1388  the volume elements. ---*/
1389  const vector<int> &ranksSend = FEMGeometry->GetRanksSend();
1390  const vector<int> &ranksRecv = FEMGeometry->GetRanksRecv();
1391  const vector<vector<unsigned long> > &elementsSend = FEMGeometry->GetEntitiesSend();
1392  const vector<vector<unsigned long> > &elementsRecv = FEMGeometry->GetEntitiesRecv();
1393 
1394 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1395 
1396  /* Parallel implementation. Allocate the memory for the send buffers and
1397  loop over the number of ranks to which I have to send data. Note that
1398  self communication is not excluded here. */
1399  vector<vector<unsigned long> > sendBuf;
1400  sendBuf.resize(ranksSend.size());
1401 
1402  vector<SU2_MPI::Request> sendReqs(ranksSend.size());
1403 
1404  for(unsigned i=0; i<ranksSend.size(); ++i) {
1405 
1406  /* Fill the send buffer for this rank. */
1407  for(unsigned long j=0; j<elementsSend[i].size(); ++j) {
1408  const unsigned long jj = elementsSend[i][j];
1409  for(unsigned short k=0; k<volElem[jj].nDOFsSol; ++k) {
1410  const unsigned long kk = volElem[jj].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1411  sendBuf[i].push_back(DOFsGlobalID[kk]);
1412  }
1413  }
1414 
1415  /* Send the data using non-blocking sends to avoid deadlock. */
1416  int dest = ranksSend[i];
1417  SU2_MPI::Isend(sendBuf[i].data(), sendBuf[i].size(), MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG,
1418  dest, dest, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &sendReqs[i]);
1419  }
1420 
1421  /* Create a map of the receive rank to the index in ranksRecv. */
1422  map<int,int> rankToIndRecvBuf;
1423  for(int i=0; i<(int) ranksRecv.size(); ++i)
1424  rankToIndRecvBuf[ranksRecv[i]] = i;
1425 
1426  /* Loop over the number of ranks from which I receive data. */
1427  for(unsigned long i=0; i<ranksRecv.size(); ++i) {
1428 
1429  /* Block until a message arrives and determine the source and size
1430  of the message. */
1431  SU2_MPI::Status status;
1432  SU2_MPI::Probe(MPI_ANY_SOURCE, rank, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &status);
1433  int source = status.MPI_SOURCE;
1434 
1435  int sizeMess;
1436  SU2_MPI::Get_count(&status, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, &sizeMess);
1437 
1438  /* Allocate the memory for the receive buffer, receive the message
1439  and determine the actual index of this rank in ranksRecv. */
1440  vector<unsigned long> recvBuf(sizeMess);
1441  SU2_MPI::Recv(recvBuf.data(), sizeMess, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG,
1442  source, rank, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &status);
1443 
1444  map<int,int>::const_iterator MI = rankToIndRecvBuf.find(source);
1445  source = MI->second;
1446 
1447  /* Loop over the receive elements and copy the data for its DOFs in
1448  DOFsGlobalID. */
1449  unsigned long ii = 0;
1450  for(unsigned long j=0; j<elementsRecv[source].size(); ++j) {
1451  const unsigned long jj = elementsRecv[source][j];
1452  for(unsigned short k=0; k<volElem[jj].nDOFsSol; ++k, ++ii) {
1453  const unsigned long kk = volElem[jj].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1454  DOFsGlobalID[kk] = recvBuf[ii];
1455  }
1456  }
1457  }
1458 
1459  /* Complete the non-blocking sends. */
1460  SU2_MPI::Waitall(ranksSend.size(), sendReqs.data(), MPI_STATUSES_IGNORE);
1461 
1462  /* Wild cards have been used in the communication,
1463  so synchronize the ranks to avoid problems. */
1464  SU2_MPI::Barrier(SU2_MPI::GetComm());
1465 
1466 #else
1467 
1468  /*--- Sequential implementation. Halo's may be present due to periodic
1469  boundary conditions. A loop over the receiving ranks is carried out
1470  to cover both situations, i.e. halo's present and halo's not present. ---*/
1471  for(unsigned long i=0; i<ranksRecv.size(); ++i) {
1472  for(unsigned long j=0; j<elementsRecv[i].size(); ++j) {
1473  const unsigned long elemR = elementsRecv[i][j];
1474  const unsigned long elemS = elementsSend[i][j];
1475 
1476  for(unsigned short k=0; k<volElem[elemR].nDOFsSol; ++k) {
1477  const unsigned long kR = volElem[elemR].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1478  const unsigned long kS = volElem[elemS].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1479 
1480  DOFsGlobalID[kR] = DOFsGlobalID[kS];
1481  }
1482  }
1483  }
1484 
1485 #endif
1486 
1487  /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1488  /* Step 3: Determine the entries of the graph for the locally stored */
1489  /* data. Note that this data must also be determined for the */
1490  /* halo DOFs, because the faces between partitions are */
1491  /* stored only once. */
1492  /*********************************************************************/
1493 
1494  /* Allocate the memory for the first index of nonZeroEntriesJacobian.
1495  During the construction of this data, also the halo DOFs are needed,
1496  hence it is allocate for all DOFs stored on this rank. */
1497  nonZeroEntriesJacobian.resize(nDOFsLocTot);
1498 
1499  /* The residual of the DOFs of a volume element depends on all the
1500  DOFs of that volume element. Set these dependencies. Only needed
1501  for the owned elements. */
1502  for(unsigned long i=0; i<nVolElemOwned; ++i) {
1503  for(unsigned short j=0; j<volElem[i].nDOFsSol; ++j) {
1504  const unsigned long jj = volElem[i].offsetDOFsSolLocal + j;
1505  for(unsigned short k=0; k<volElem[i].nDOFsSol; ++k) {
1506  const unsigned long kk = volElem[i].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1507  nonZeroEntriesJacobian[jj].push_back(DOFsGlobalID[kk]);
1508  }
1509  }
1510  }
1511 
1512  /* Loop over the internal matching faces to set the dependencies of the
1513  DOFs w.r.t. the DOFs of the neighbors. It is assumed that the residual
1514  of the DOFs depends on all the DOFs of the neighboring elements. This
1515  is always correct for the Navier-Stokes equations. For the Euler equations
1516  in combination with a lumped mass matrix, this is a conservative
1517  estimate. However, it is also correct when the full mass matrix is used.
1518  Therefore, this assumption is used here. */
1519  const unsigned short nTimeLevels = config->GetnLevels_TimeAccurateLTS();
1520  for(unsigned long i=0; i<nMatchingInternalFacesWithHaloElem[nTimeLevels]; ++i) {
1521 
1522  /* Easier storage of the elements on both sides. */
1523  const unsigned long elem0 = matchingInternalFaces[i].elemID0;
1524  const unsigned long elem1 = matchingInternalFaces[i].elemID1;
1525 
1526  /* Double loop over the DOFs of both elements and set the dependencies
1527  accordingly. */
1528  for(unsigned short j=0; j<volElem[elem0].nDOFsSol; ++j) {
1529  const unsigned long jj = volElem[elem0].offsetDOFsSolLocal + j;
1530  for(unsigned short k=0; k<volElem[elem1].nDOFsSol; ++k) {
1531  const unsigned long kk = volElem[elem1].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1532 
1533  nonZeroEntriesJacobian[jj].push_back(DOFsGlobalID[kk]);
1534  nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kk].push_back(DOFsGlobalID[jj]);
1535  }
1536  }
1537  }
1538 
1539  /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1540  /* Step 4: Carry out the communication for the halo DOFs, such that */
1541  /* all the graph information is obtained for the owned DOFs. */
1542  /*********************************************************************/
1543 
1544 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1545 
1546  /* Parallel implementation. Allocate the memory for the inverse send buffers
1547  and loop over the number of ranks to which I have to send data for the
1548  inverse communication pattern. Note that self communication is not
1549  excluded here, because efficiency is not really important for this function. */
1550  vector<vector<unsigned long> > invSendBuf;
1551  invSendBuf.resize(ranksRecv.size());
1552 
1553  vector<SU2_MPI::Request> invSendReqs(ranksRecv.size());
1554 
1555  for(unsigned i=0; i<ranksRecv.size(); ++i) {
1556 
1557  /* Fill the inverse send buffer for this rank. */
1558  for(unsigned long j=0; j<elementsRecv[i].size(); ++j) {
1559  const unsigned long jj = elementsRecv[i][j];
1560  for(unsigned short k=0; k<volElem[jj].nDOFsSol; ++k) {
1561  const unsigned long kk = volElem[jj].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1562  invSendBuf[i].push_back(nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kk].size());
1563  invSendBuf[i].insert(invSendBuf[i].end(),
1564  nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kk].begin(),
1565  nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kk].end());
1566  }
1567  }
1568 
1569  /* Send the data using non-blocking sends to avoid deadlock. */
1570  int dest = ranksRecv[i];
1571  SU2_MPI::Isend(invSendBuf[i].data(), invSendBuf[i].size(), MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG,
1572  dest, dest+1, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &invSendReqs[i]);
1573  }
1574 
1575  /* Create a map of the inverse receive (i.e. the original send) rank
1576  to the index in ranksSend. */
1577  map<int,int> rankToIndSendBuf;
1578  for(int i=0; i<(int) ranksSend.size(); ++i)
1579  rankToIndSendBuf[ranksSend[i]] = i;
1580 
1581  /* Loop over the number of ranks from which I receive data
1582  in the inverse communication. */
1583  for(unsigned long i=0; i<ranksSend.size(); ++i) {
1584 
1585  /* Block until a message arrives and determine the source and size
1586  of the message. */
1587  SU2_MPI::Status status;
1588  SU2_MPI::Probe(MPI_ANY_SOURCE, rank+1, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &status);
1589  int source = status.MPI_SOURCE;
1590 
1591  int sizeMess;
1592  SU2_MPI::Get_count(&status, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, &sizeMess);
1593 
1594  /* Allocate the memory for the receive buffer, receive the message
1595  and determine the actual index of this rank in ranksSend. */
1596  vector<unsigned long> recvBuf(sizeMess);
1597  SU2_MPI::Recv(recvBuf.data(), sizeMess, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG,
1598  source, rank+1, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &status);
1599 
1600  map<int,int>::const_iterator MI = rankToIndSendBuf.find(source);
1601  source = MI->second;
1602 
1603  /* Loop over the elements for which the data was just received. */
1604  int ii = 0;
1605  for(unsigned long j=0; j<elementsSend[source].size(); ++j) {
1606  const unsigned long jj = elementsSend[source][j];
1607 
1608  for(unsigned short k=0; k<volElem[jj].nDOFsSol; ++k) {
1609  const unsigned long kk = volElem[jj].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1610  const unsigned long nEntries = recvBuf[ii++];
1611 
1612  nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kk].insert(nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kk].end(),
1613  recvBuf.data() + ii,
1614  recvBuf.data() + ii + nEntries);
1615  ii += nEntries;
1616  }
1617  }
1618  }
1619 
1620  /* Complete the non-blocking sends. */
1621  SU2_MPI::Waitall(ranksRecv.size(), invSendReqs.data(), MPI_STATUSES_IGNORE);
1622 
1623  /* Wild cards have been used in the communication,
1624  so synchronize the ranks to avoid problems. */
1625  SU2_MPI::Barrier(SU2_MPI::GetComm());
1626 
1627 #else
1628  /*--- Sequential implementation. Just add the data of the halo DOFs
1629  to the corresponding owned DOFs. Note that only when periodic
1630  boundary conditions are present, something will happen. ---*/
1631  for(unsigned long i=0; i<ranksSend.size(); ++i) {
1632  for(unsigned long j=0; j<elementsSend[i].size(); ++j) {
1633  const unsigned long elemR = elementsRecv[i][j];
1634  const unsigned long elemS = elementsSend[i][j];
1635 
1636  for(unsigned short k=0; k<volElem[elemR].nDOFsSol; ++k) {
1637  const unsigned long kR = volElem[elemR].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1638  const unsigned long kS = volElem[elemS].offsetDOFsSolLocal + k;
1639 
1640  nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kS].insert(nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kS].end(),
1641  nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kR].begin(),
1642  nonZeroEntriesJacobian[kR].end());
1643  }
1644  }
1645  }
1646 
1647 #endif
1648 
1649  /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1650  /* Step 5: Sort the entries of nonZeroEntriesJacobian in increasing */
1651  /* order and remove possible double entries (caused by */
1652  /* periodic boundaries under certain circumstances). Delete */
1653  /* the memory of the halo data, because it is not needed */
1654  /* anymore. */
1655  /*********************************************************************/
1656 
1657  /* Loop over the locally owned DOFs and remove the possible double
1658  entries. This is accomplished by first sorting the data followed
1659  by the removal of duplicate entries using the unique function. */
1660  for(unsigned long i=0; i<nDOFsLocOwned; ++i) {
1661  sort(nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i].begin(), nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i].end());
1662  vector<unsigned long>::iterator lastEntry;
1663  lastEntry = unique(nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i].begin(), nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i].end());
1664  nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i].erase(lastEntry, nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i].end());
1665  }
1666 
1667  /* Delete the memory of the halo data. To make sure that the memory
1668  is physically deleted, use the swap function. */
1669  for(unsigned long i=nDOFsLocOwned; i<nDOFsLocTot; ++i)
1670  vector<unsigned long>().swap(nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i]);
1671 }
1672 
1673 void CFEM_DG_EulerSolver::MetaDataJacobianComputation(const CMeshFEM *FEMGeometry,
1674  const vector<int> &colorLocalDOFs) {
1675 
1676  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1677  /*--- Part 1: Convert the coloring information of the DOFs to the ---*/
1678  /*--- reverse information, namely the DOFs for each color. ---*/
1679  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1680 
1681  /* Determine the locally owned DOFs for each color. */
1682  localDOFsPerColor.resize(nGlobalColors);
1683 
1684  for(unsigned long i=0; i<nDOFsLocOwned; ++i)
1685  localDOFsPerColor[colorLocalDOFs[i]].push_back(i);
1686 
1687  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1688  /*--- Part 2: Create the mapping from the global matrix index to the ---*/
1689  /*--- color. In parallel this is a bit more work than one might ---*/
1690  /*--- think, because the parallel data structures do not store ---*/
1691  /*--- all the matrix entities of the local DOFs. Hence, this ---*/
1692  /*--- must be reconstructed via communication. ---*/
1693  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
1694 
1695  /* Get the send and receive ranks for FEMGeometry. */
1696  const vector<int> &ranksSend = FEMGeometry->GetRanksSend();
1697  const vector<int> &ranksRecv = FEMGeometry->GetRanksRecv();
1698 
1699  /* Store the ranks this rank communicates with in a map. These are both
1700  sending and receiving ranks. Make sure to exclude my own rank. */
1701  map<int,int> rankCommToInd;
1702  for(unsigned long i=0; i<ranksSend.size(); ++i) {
1703  if(ranksSend[i] != rank) {
1704  const int ind = (int)rankCommToInd.size();
1705  rankCommToInd[ranksSend[i]] = ind;
1706  }
1707  }
1708 
1709  for(unsigned long i=0; i<ranksRecv.size(); ++i) {
1710  map<int,int>::const_iterator MI = rankCommToInd.find(ranksRecv[i]);
1711  if((MI == rankCommToInd.end()) &&(ranksRecv[i] != rank)) {
1712  const int ind = (int)rankCommToInd.size();
1713  rankCommToInd[ranksRecv[i]] = ind;
1714  }
1715  }
1716 
1717  /* Allocate the memory for the first index of the send buffers. */
1718  vector<vector<unsigned long> > sendBuf(rankCommToInd.size(), vector<unsigned long>(0));
1719 
1720  /* Define the map from the global matrix index to the color and the set to
1721  keep track whether an index has already been treated. */
1722  map<unsigned long, int> mapMatrixIndToColor;
1723  set<unsigned long> setTreatedIndices;
1724 
1725  /* Loop over the owned DOFs and its matrix entries to create the contents of
1726  either mapMatrixIndToColor (owned DOFs) or sendBuf (unowned DOFs). */
1727  for(unsigned long i=0; i<nDOFsLocOwned; ++i) {
1728  for(unsigned long j=0; j<nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i].size(); ++j) {
1729  const unsigned long jj = nonZeroEntriesJacobian[i][j];
1730 
1731  /* Check if jj has not been stored yet. */
1732  pair<set<unsigned long>::iterator,bool> attempt = setTreatedIndices.insert(jj);
1733  if( attempt.second ) {
1734 
1735  /* Determine the rank where this DOF is stored. */
1736  vector<unsigned long>::iterator low;
1737  low = lower_bound(nDOFsPerRank.begin(), nDOFsPerRank.end(), jj);
1738  int rankDOF = (int)(low - nDOFsPerRank.begin());
1739  if(*low > jj) --rankDOF;
1740 
1741  /* If rankDOF is the current rank, create the entry in
1742  mapMatrixIndToColor. Otherwise store jj in the appropriate send
1743  buffer. */
1744  if(rankDOF == rank) {
1745  mapMatrixIndToColor[jj] = colorLocalDOFs[jj-nDOFsPerRank[rank]];
1746  }
1747  else {
1748  map<int,int>::const_iterator MI = rankCommToInd.find(rankDOF);
1749  sendBuf[MI->second].push_back(jj);
1750  }
1751  }
1752  }
1753  }
1754 
1755 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1756 
1757  /*--- Loop over the ranks to which this rank has to send data.
1758  Use non-blocking sends to avoid deadlock. ---*/
1759  vector<SU2_MPI::Request> sendReqs(rankCommToInd.size());
1760 
1761  map<int,int>::const_iterator MI = rankCommToInd.begin();
1762  for(unsigned long i=0; i<rankCommToInd.size(); ++i, ++MI) {
1763  const int dest = MI->first;
1764  const int ind = MI->second;
1765 
1766  SU2_MPI::Isend(sendBuf[ind].data(), sendBuf[ind].size(), MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG,
1767  dest, dest+2, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &sendReqs[i]);
1768  }
1769 
1770  /* Loop over the ranks from which I receive data to be processed. The number
1771  of ranks is equal to the number of ranks to which I just sent data. */
1772  vector<SU2_MPI::Request> sendReturnReqs(rankCommToInd.size());
1773  vector<vector<int> > sendReturnBuf(rankCommToInd.size(), vector<int>(0));
1774  for(unsigned long i=0; i<rankCommToInd.size(); ++i) {
1775 
1776  /* Block until a message arrives and determine the source and size
1777  of the message. */
1778  SU2_MPI::Status status;
1779  SU2_MPI::Probe(MPI_ANY_SOURCE, rank+2, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &status);
1780  int source = status.MPI_SOURCE;
1781 
1782  int sizeMess;
1783  SU2_MPI::Get_count(&status, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, &sizeMess);
1784 
1785  /* Allocate the memory for the receive buffer as well as for the
1786  return send buffer. Receive the message afterwards. */
1787  vector<unsigned long> recvBuf(sizeMess);
1788  sendReturnBuf[i].resize(sizeMess);
1789 
1790  SU2_MPI::Recv(recvBuf.data(), sizeMess, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG,
1791  source, rank+2, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &status);
1792 
1793  /* Loop over the data just received and fill the return send buffer
1794  with the color of the DOFs. */
1795  for(int j=0; j<sizeMess; ++j) {
1796  const unsigned long jj = recvBuf[j] - nDOFsPerRank[rank];
